mean_en: the branch of biology that conducts comparative studies of the social organization of animals (including human beings) with regard to its evolutionary history
sentence: Studying how ants work together is a good lesson in sociobiology.
sentence_trans: 研究蚂蚁如何共同工作是生物社会学中的典例。
word_etyma: socio社会 ＋ bio生物 ＋ logy...学 → sociobiology生物社会学
